boundingBoxIsVisible(BSPNode) - Method in class gui.FirstPersonView
Decide if the bounding box is visible
BSPBranch - Class in generation
BSPNodes are used to build a binary tree, where internal nodes keep track of lower and upper bounds of (x,y) coordinates.
BSPBranch(int, int, int, int, BSPNode, BSPNode) - Constructor for class generation.BSPBranch
Constructor with values for all internal fields Upper and lower bound values are obtained from the given left and right branches, so those trees must be carry valid values.
BSPBuilder - Class in generation
This class has the responsibility to obtain the tree of BSP nodes for a given maze.
BSPBuilder(Order, Distance, Floorplan, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class generation.BSPBuilder
Constructor
BSPLeaf - Class in generation
A leaf node for a tree of BSPNodes.
BSPLeaf(ArrayList<Wall>) - Constructor for class generation.BSPLeaf
Constructor stores reference to given list of walls and updates bounds
BSPNode - Class in generation
BSPNodes are used to build a binary tree, where internal nodes keep track of lower and upper bounds of (x,y) coordinates.
BSPNode() - Constructor for class generation.BSPNode
 
bspRoot - Variable in class gui.FirstPersonView
The root node to a tree with walls (Wall objects) in its leaves.
